extendedInfo.description: English to Russian Phrasebook which contains all the essential travel words and phrases you will need, more than 250 phrases and words which will help you on your trip. All of content is downloaded onto your device so you do not need internet connection to use this app.All phrases and words are transliterated into English as well so they are easier to pronounce if you cannot read Russian well.Also included is a full English to Russian Translator which will give you access to over 5,000,000 more words and phrases*.Use the search feature to quickly find the phrase you need, or browse one of the nine categories. The categories are Public Transportation, Common Phrases, Shopping, Restaurants, Numbers and Money, Emergencies, Hotels, Dates and Times, Asking for Directions, and Other.Brought to you by the creator of Near to Here, one of the most popular Travel Apps in the App Store.*need internet or 3G connection for this feature of the app.

reviews.comment: Good app. But please increase the number of phrases. These are for beginers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work.
reviews.comment: Just a weak list of phrases and nothing works.
reviews.author: Gerg Somberg
